meaningMnemonic: The radical for <radical>center</radical> and the kanji for <kanji>center</kanji> are exactly the same.
readingMnemonic: Remember that guy from the 央 radical fastening his belt across the <kanji>center</kanji> of his body? This guy always secures his belt at the center — not slightly to the left, not slightly to the right, but dead center. His precision is so mind-blowing that everyone watching can't help but say, "<reading>Ohh</reading>!"(おう).
